title: Mules and Men - passage inference about speaker

content.question: It can be inferred from the passage that the speaker was glad when she was told, "You may go and collect Negro folk-lore" (sentence 1) because

choices.label: she did not like the university she was attending
it was something she had had little success at
it was something she had been doing informally all her life
she knew that folklore was easy to collect

content.answer: it was something she had been doing informally all her life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
